resources.string: Explicit Intent to ChildActivity. Opens destination Activity with back button to Main/Parent, adding destination Activity to the top of Back Stack
Explicit Intent to SingleTaskActivity. Opens single task destination Activity without adding it to Back Stack, back goes where user was (might be other app)
Implicit Intent. System will look for a suitable App to perform the action with the provided URL/URI host and schema. Will show a chooser to the user to select the app to do the action.
Large-format notifications that include a lot of text

Large-format notifications that include a large image attachment. 
Recommended sizes:
 - Minimum - 512x256
 - Balanced - 1024x512
 - Maximum - 2048x1024
 Ratio - 2:1
Large-format notifications that include a list of (up to 5) strings.
